entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning and early this afternoon. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
